meanings.sent1: The sweet, jamlike scent of flowers filled the room.
meanings.sent2: Her dress had a jamlike color that stood out in the crowd.
meanings.sent3: The jamlike texture of the mud made it hard to walk through.
meanings.sent4: The jamlike consistency of the sauce coated the pasta perfectly.
meanings.sent5: The jamlike appearance of the sunset painted the sky in shades of orange and pink.

meanings.definition: Having the consistency or texture of jam.
meanings.sent1: The cake had a jamlike layer in the middle that added sweetness.
meanings.sent2: The jamlike spread on the toast melted with each bite.
meanings.sent3: His hair gel gave it a jamlike hold that lasted all day.
meanings.sent4: The jamlike texture of the pudding made it a favorite dessert.
meanings.sent5: The jamlike consistency of the glue made it easy to stick things together.
